wikipedia_page.main: Martin Joyce (24 January 1894 – 1960) was an English footballer who made 181 appearances in the Football League playing for Darlington and Durham City. He also played non-league football for Jarrow St Bede's.

response: In Darlington's second season in the Football League, Golightly replaced Irvine Boocock at right back for the match against Hartlepools United in December 1922, and remained in the team for six Third Division South matches, after which Tommy Greaves and Martin Joyce were preferred. He also appeared once in January 1924.
